hackathon-description-text: Back in its second year, TM Forum is bringing together enterprise developers, designers and technologists from around the world to create, hack and deliver meaningful solutions to improve the quality of life through innovative applications.  If you're passionate about developing the latest technology, tools and services for tomorrow's smart citizen in the picturesque host city of Nice, France then register for FREE.  Participants will have two days to build and code their app solution with help from TM Forum experts and our partners, Ericsson, IBM, Orange and FIWARE while they compete for over €20,000 worth of prizes, including €11,000 cash.
hackathon-eligibility: We welcome all those who feel they can make a positive contribution to a team. Example roles include:  Developers, Designer, Students, Entrepreneur, Urban Experts and Data Scientist.
hackathon-rules: Official Rules for the TM Forum Smart Citizens Hackathon

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Smart Lifestyle: Optimize the Urban Park Experience
Using the connected car to make our lives easier and simpler.  Be create and propose new solutions for a smart city.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Smart Living Challenge: Accelerating Connected Cars

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Take e-Health services to the next level.  Use the provided tools to allow users to be seen by a physician, fill a prescription and have medicine delivered to their door in one simple, seamless and safe application.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Smart Health Challenge: Creating the Ultimate in Integrated Healthcare

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1 Boulevard Maître Maurice Slama, 06200 Nice, France

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How innovative is the solution proposed
How useful is the solution to the market.  How well does it solve a problem.
Most innovative use of TM Forum Management APIs
Most integrated solution set of all APIs and platforms

hackathon-location-address: 1 Boulevard Maître Maurice Slama, 06200 Nice, France
hackathon-description-header: Designing for those "In the Know" and "On the Go"
